title: While You’re All Distracted By Ukraine…
description:
How do the actions of Canada’s government around freezing bank accounts and crowdfunding services fit in with a larger global agenda to regulate and surveil cryptocurrencies?
#Bitcoin #Canada #Crypto

References

https://reclaimthenet.org/how-governments-plan-to-extend-financial-surveillance-to-cryptocurrencies/

https://www.wsj.com/articles/cftc-chair-to-testify-on-cryptocurrencies-as-congress-weighs-legislation-11644414710

https://www.cnbc.com/2022/02/15/some-lawmakers-and-their-families-are-betting-thousands-on-crypto.html

title: Oh… So THIS Is Why Ukraine Is Being Attacked
description:
What's the way out of the conflict in Ukraine? Yanis Varoufakis spoke to me about some of the potential solutions. 
#Russia #Ukraine #war #Putin
